# Nuclear Music Player

> Nuclear is a free, open-source desktop music player that streams from free sources and local libraries. Cross-platform (Windows, macOS, Linux), privacy-respecting (no tracking, no telemetry), and AGPL licensed.

The website is currently under construction. Nuclear is being rebuilt from scratch with a new player, new infrastructure, and a new website.

## Pages

- [Home](https://nuclearplayer.github.io/nuclear-xrd/): Landing page (currently under construction)

## External

- [GitHub Repository](https://github.com/NuclearPlayer/nuclear-xrd): Source code for the new version
- [Legacy Repository](https://github.com/nukeop/nuclear): Source code for the current released version
- [Discord](https://discord.gg/JqPjKxE): Community chat
- [Gitbook](https://docs.nuclearplayer.com/nuclear-xrd/): Documentation for the new version
